channel.title: BeamNG.Drive
channel.description:
Anybody get this game yet? I recommend it to anybody who likes physics or driving games.
[img width=1080]http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/38625286360864284/7A0B0D6DFC1B002CE12BBDDDE8938E9755FB5409/[/img]
[img width=1080]http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/38625286360864534/F2EA5271F9DF327FE22EA580DF73D33D7A014068/[/img]
It's really a little scary honestly, especially if you've been in a high-speed car accident before, dunno why just makes me think of one of mine lol

item.title: BeamNG.Drive
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Yeah there’s gonna be missions like delivery and such. There’s a wonky AI implemented right now that’s pretty hilarious the way it works but it’s supposed to be modified later to have races and such.


just imagine lol

Read full topic

item.title: BeamNG.Drive
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

That would be cool. Back when I played I think there was one vehicle and only one map. It was still fun, though.

Read full topic

item.title: BeamNG.Drive
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Travas:

Yeah I played it a year or so ago before it was on steam. It was decent.

It’s got scenarios and a bunch of vanilla maps and vehicles now, they’re supposed to have some sort of campaign and mission system here soon.

Read full topic

item.title: BeamNG.Drive
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:551812”][quote author=Limits link=topic=670728.msg4484935#msg4484935 date=1433388520]
I can’t believe that this thread was just made now. I’m saying this because this game has been around for a year or two now.
[/quote]
Well for the record, it just now got released for purchase on steam in early access alpha.[/quote]
Oh okay, I didn’t know that bit.

Read full topic
